title: Franck Turpin
text:
Franck Turpin (born January 27, 1977 in <a href="Lille">Lille</a>) is a French professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. Currently, he plays in the <a href="Championnat%20de%20France%20amateur">Championnat de France amateur</a> for <a href="Gap%20FC">Gap FC</a>.
He played on the professional level in <a href="Ligue%201">Ligue 1</a> for <a href="Lille%20OSC">Lille OSC</a>.
